basics.summary: Samuel is born [here](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cameroun). Samuel started is professionnal career as software developer in 2006 in France. He has since worked as system integrator and software developer on enterprise grade applications for IT Consulting firms check his [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samuelmolu/) profile.

work.summary: System Developer, System Designer, System Integrator
highlights: Sopra Group (4 years) worked for Bouyges Telecom, EDF and more as System Integrator, System Analyst
Accenture (4 years) worked for Societe General Retail Banking, Credit du Nord, La Banque Postale as Developer, System Integrator, System Design
Devoteam (6 months) worked for BNP Cardiff as Developer, System Design

skills.name: RELATOR
keywords: Samuel enjoy close relationships with others. He find deep satisfaction in working hard with friends to achieve a goal.

skills.name: RESTORATIVE
keywords: Samuel is adept at dealing with problems. He's good at figuring out what is wrong and resolving it.

skills.name: ARRANGER
keywords: Samuel organize, but also have a flexibility that complements this ability. He like to figure out how all of the pieces and resources can be arranged for maximum productivity.

skills.name: MotherF$%#$^&*!
